I would rather be someone the president calls on from time to time for personal advice, without me expecting anything in return or asking for a position, Colin Powell said. On Afghanistan, Colin Powell said the 30,000 additional U.S. troops Barack Obama authorized in December 2009 haven't turned the war decisively yet. The last of the additional troops arrived in October.

Killer bees, space aliens... now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states. The truth is, no state wants to declare bankruptcy, no state needs to declare bankruptcy, and no state would.
